Text: Touch (manga):  It was originally serialized in the weekly manga magazine "Shōnen Sunday" from 1981–1986, and sold over 100 million copies, making it one of the best-selling manga series.

Text: Touch (manga):  The manga was also adapted into a 101-episode anime television series – which was one of the highest-rated anime television series ever, three theatrical anime movies which summarized the TV series, two anime television specials which take place after the events in the TV series, a live-action TV drama special, and a live-action movie released in 2005.
